paper_abstract: A new algebraic cubature formula of degree 2n+1 for the product Chebyshev measure in the d-cube with a parts per thousand n (d) /2 (d-1) nodes is established. The new formula is then applied to polynomial hyperinterpolation of degree n in three variables, in which coefficients of the product Chebyshev orthonormal basis are computed by a fast algorithm based on the 3-dimensional FFT. Moreover, integration of the hyperinterpolant provides a new Clenshaw-Curtis type cubature formula in the 3-cube.
paper_title: New cubature formulae and hyperinterpolation in three variables
